Biography

2016 (Junior): Totaled 10 carries for 17 yards on the year… Caught a pair of passes for four yards… Rushed for a season-high 11 yards in season opener against Ave Maria… Rushed a season-high five times against West Georgia.

Transferred to UWF from Yuba College in Marysville, Calif. in the summer of 2016 ... In two seasons of junior college, he totaled 219 carries, 1,158 yards, 5.3 yards per rush, seven TD and seven receptions for 34 yards ... Ran a 4.5 second 40-yard dash.

2015 (Sophomore at Yuba College): Appeared in all 10 games for coach Rion Rhoades in 2015 ... Rushed for 971 yards on 188 carries and five TDs ... Averaged 107.9 ypg and 5.2 yards per rush ... Had six games of 100 yards rushing ... Had career-high 169 yards on 28 carries against Redwoods (11/7/15) ... Rushed a career-high 29 times twice - at San Jose (10/3/15) and at Monterey (10/31/15) ... Also caught four passes for 17 yards, giving him 988 all-purpose yards (109.8 ypg) ... Yuba went 5-5 in the California Community College Athletic Association (CCCAA).

PREP: Played for coach Nate Hudson at South Dade HS in Homestead, Fla.
